data.name: SizeType
desc: The height value of objects like text frames or table rows may be interpreted in different ways.

The values may specify the absolute height (SIZETYPE_FIX), the minimum height (SIZETYPE_MIN), or they are ignored (SIZETYPE_VAR), in which case the real height depends on the content. This information is contained in a property called \"SizeType\".

items.name: MIN
lines: The height property determines the minimum height of the object, but the actual height will be increased if the content demands it.
